title: Walgreens to Take Full Ownership of Shields Health; Deal valued at $1.37 billion will involve acquiring additional 30% stake
text:
Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. has reached a $1.37 billion deal to take full ownership of Shields Health Solutions.

The company said Tuesday that it had reached an agreement to acquire an additional 30% stake in the company, rounding out the 70% stake it had built up since July 2019.

The transaction is expected to close by the end of the calendar year.The Walgreens chain operator said Shields has delivered 57% sales growth in the first nine months of 2022 and will continue operating as a distinct business and brand within Walgreens.

Write to Dean Seal at dean.seal@wsj.com

Walgreens to Take Full Ownership of Shields Health
